thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Ruzica Regulic

author: Ruzica Regulic
title: Ruzica Regulic
text:
I would recommend Optimal Print to anyone. Great range of cards and the two day postage offer is to hard to go past.
I would suggest a few more ideas for older men. Also a better way to view the final product. The writing on the front of the invitation was quite hard to read but it's hard to tell on the PC. I have used this company before and that is why I came back. Other places were offering great invites but with a long turnaround so if you would like great and quick service these are the people for you.
